title: Andrin Hunziker
text:
Andrin Hunziker (born 21 February 2003) is a Swiss <a href="Association%20football">footballer</a> who plays as a <a href="Forward%20%28association%20football%29">forward</a> for <a href="FC%20Basel">FC Basel</a>.
Career.
A youth academy graduate of <a href="FC%20Basel">Basel</a>, Hunziker made his professional debut on 27 February 2021 in a 1–3 <a href="Swiss%20Super%20League">league</a> defeat against <a href="FC%20St.%20Gallen">St. Gallen</a>.
Hunziker is a current Swiss youth international.
